displaytitle: Figure studies from Cranmer's Bible, 1539, for The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed: in graphite, lower center: Cranmer's Bible. Holbein 1539.

titles.title: Figure Studies after The Great Bible, 1539

Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.

makers.displaymaker: Sir George Hayter, 1792–1871; born and died London, England

bibliography.boilertext: Ann V. Gunn, "Sir George Hayter, Victorian history painting, and a religious controversy," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 53, no. 1 (1994): p. 2-32.
